title: After the Android 11 update, my Spotify stops playing everytime my phone is locked. Pixel 3A XL.
content: After Android 11 update, my Spotify stops playing everytime my phone locks. Then when I turn the screen back on, the music automatically starts playing. Tried uninstalling Spotify and restarting my phone, but unsuccessful. Hoping a new update is released soon. I've had a great Pixel experience this far, but this definitely hinders that.
